## computeBasicAuthHeader() function

Compute and return a Basic Authorization header from a username and password.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function computeBasicAuthHeader(username: string, password: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  username | string | The username or client id |
|  password | string | The password or client secret |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

{<!-- -->string<!-- -->} - A Basic Auth header with format "Basic <encoded-credentials>"
